title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: When I am editing text in the editor, I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' in the context menu. I had to switch to the Outline view to access it. It seems that the actions are distributed based on personal taste, which is not ideal. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. However, it is important that all actions are reachable from the editor, without needing to switch the view.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu when I am editing text.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu when I am editing text.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not listed in the context menu.
